resourceBrowser.title: Jupyter Notebook Tutorials
resourceBrowser.description: The Jupyter notebooks contained in this notebook viewer pull data from various sources to generate and output useful tables, charts, graphs, and models. Each notebook is static, meaning the data being used by the notebooks is not updated in real time.

resources.title: Data analysis for the Multi-country PROMOTE HIV Antiretroviral Treatment Observational Cohort in Sub-Saharan Africa
resources.description: This notebook showcases the ability to do exploratory analysis with data available from the PROMOTE HIV Antiretroviral Treatment Observational Cohort of the PROMOTE study which is available in the eLwazi Data Commons. The analysis is not intended to constitute advice nor is it to be used as a substitute for decision making from a professional.

resources.title: Data analysis for pneumonia among children in a birth cohort in South Africa
resources.description: In this notebook, we explore the child hospitalization data for pneumonia from South Africa to identify the clinical features associated with serious outcomes and prolonged hospitalization.

introduction.heading: Data Commons
introduction.text: The platform, which is accessed via user workspaces, will enable discovery of local and federated cohorts and datasets and provide seamless access to a suite of tools and workflows that enable reproducible data analysis and cross-consortium projects.

buttons.name: Define Data Field
buttons.body: The eLwazi Data Commons define the data in a general way. Please study the dictionary before you start browsing.
buttons.label: Learn more

buttons.name: Explore Data
buttons.body: The Exploration Page gives you insights and a clear overview under selected factors.
buttons.label: Explore data

buttons.name: Access Data
buttons.body: Use our selected tool to filter out the data you need.
buttons.label: Query data

buttons.name: Submit Data
buttons.body: Submit Data based on the dictionary.
buttons.label: Submit data
